channel.title: CVE Feed for OMRON Corporation -- CP1L-EL20DR-D
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OMRON Corporation -- CP1L-EL20DR-D

item.title: CVE-2023-22357|2023-01-17T00:00:00 -- omron%20corporation -- cp1l-el20dr-d
item.description: Active debug code exists in OMRON CP1L-EL20DR-D all versions, which may lead to a command that is not specified in FINS protocol being executed without authentication. A remote unauthenticated attacker may read/write in arbitrary area of the device memory, which may lead to overwriting the firmware, causing a denial-of-service (DoS) condition, and/or arbitrary code execution.
